bug.author: reyoung
bug.summary: Need python `request` package in database but it is not marked as a dependency.
bug.description: We use Python package in our package <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/Paddle/blob/develop/python/paddle/v2/dataset/common.py#L15>paddle.v2.dataset</denchmark-link> . But our python code didn't add dependencies for this requirement.
